text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump With all of the “Justified Riots” in Democratic managed cities/states, do you really believe the COVID-19 drama was as bad as Fauci said? We shut an entire country down based on that man’s projections and he kept changing his point of view constantly. I watched every interview.
